intro.description:
Before linking Nest Protect you need to create your own OAuth 2.0 client in the Google Cloud Console.

1. Visit https://console.cloud.google.com and sign in.
2. Create a new project or select an existing one.
3. Configure the OAuth consent screen as External and add your own email address as a test user.
4. Create new credentials → OAuth client ID with the application type Web application.
5. Enter the authorized redirect URI of your Home Assistant instance followed by /auth/external/callback.
   This URL must match your external Home Assistant URL (Settings → System → Network → External URL).
   Examples:
   https://yourname.ui.nabu.casa/auth/external/callback
   https://myha.duckdns.org:8123/auth/external/callback
6. Copy the generated client ID and client secret.
7. Click Next and enter these values in the following step.
